content.question: In the first paragraph, the author uses the phrase “a ‘Renaissance Maecenas’ ” primarily to emphasize

choices.label: Mendoza’s support for the work of Indian artists
the intermingling of European and American cultural traditions
the toll of the Spanish conquest on native craft traditions
the importance of the picture-writing tradition in Mexican history

content.answer: Mendoza’s support for the work of Indian artists

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
